document_data.mainbody:
Josinn Kell was a commoner from the village of West Harbor in the Mere of Dead Men circa 1374 DR.
Josinn was brash young man with blond hair and neatly short-trimmed facial hair. He had an intense stare as if constantly looking for weaknesses and vulnerabilities.
Circa the , the recently rebuilt mire village of West Harbor was menaced by a duo of black dragons. In fear of his homes destruction, Josinn Kell, along with many other villages, picked up arms and began training in case West Harbor needed defending. Josinns weapon of choice was a single club and he defended himself with a small shield.
